quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
name: James Humes

quote: Democracy is the art and science of running the circus from the monkey cage.
name: H. L. Mencken

quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
name: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
name: Victor Pinchuk

quote: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Riding a race bike is an art - a thing that you do because you feel something inside.
name: Valentino Rossi

quote: Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
name: Sun Tzu

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A work of art which did not begin in emotion is not art.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
name: Henri Poincare

quote: You use a glass mirror to see your face; you use works of art to see your soul.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The true work of art is but a shadow of the divine perfection.
name: Michelangelo

quote: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I never know what I'm going to put on the canvas. The canvas paints itself. I'm just the middleman.
name: Peter Max

quote: The art of medicine consists in amusing the patient while nature cures the disease.
name: Voltaire

quote: It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: The art of a people is a true mirror to their minds.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: The art and science of asking questions is the source of all knowledge.
name: Thomas Berger

quote: Creative without strategy is called 'art.' Creative with strategy is called 'advertising.'
name: Jef I. Richards

quote: Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Without innovation, it is a corpse.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
name: Julia Morgan

quote: Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability.
name: William Osler

quote: Some painters transform the sun into a yellow spot, others transform a yellow spot into the sun.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: A picture is worth a thousand words.
name: Unknown

quote: This world is but a canvas to our imagination.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating. It is either good or bad.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Diversity: the art of thinking independently together.
name: Malcolm Forbes

quote: The artist vocation is to send light into the human heart.
name: George Sand

quote: Technology, like art, is a soaring exercise of the human imagination.
name: Daniel Bell

quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The art of art, the glory of expression and the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: O, thou art fairer than the evening air clad in the beauty of a thousand stars.
name: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Personality is everything in art and poetry.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Every painting is a voyage into a sacred harbour.
name: Giotto di Bondone

quote: The art of simplicity is a puzzle of complexity.
name: Douglas Horton

quote: Painting is self-discovery. Every good artist paints what he is.
name: Jackson Pollock

quote: Art is never finished, only abandoned.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: The job of the artist is always to deepen the mystery.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: I just love pretty things, whether it is art, a song or a pair of shoes.
name: Rita Ora

quote: Painting is easy when you don't know how, but very difficult when you do.
name: Edgar Degas

quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
name: Aristotle

quote: The art of writing is the art of discovering what you believe.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Simplicity and repose are the qualities that measure the true value of any work of art.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Space is the breath of art.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: I decided on the spot that I would be an artist, and I assure you, it was no ordinary artist I had in mind.
name: Henry Ossawa Tanner

quote: Next to the Word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.
name: Martin Luther

quote: Art can never exist without naked beauty displayed.
name: William Blake

quote: A picture is a poem without words.
name: Horace

quote: Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money they don't have for something they don't need.
name: Will Rogers

quote: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death.
name: William Blake

quote: Furniture should always be comfortable. And always have a piece of art that you made somewhere in the home.
name: Tamara Taylor

quote: The mother art is architecture. Without an architecture of our own we have no soul of our own civilization.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Culture is the arts elevated to a set of beliefs.
name: Thomas Wolfe

quote: Color is my day-long obsession, joy and torment.
name: Claude Monet

quote: Art is not a handicraft, it is the transmission of feeling the artist has experienced.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: There's no art to find the mind's construction in the face.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Painting is just another way of keeping a diary.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.
name: Dorothea Lange

quote: An artist is not paid for his labor but for his vision.
name: James Whistler

quote: Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art.
name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: I haven't mastered the art of sitting and smiling.
name: Ashley Wagner

quote: I realize that every picture isn't a work of art.
name: Conrad Hall

quote: You can't do sketches enough. Sketch everything and keep your curiosity fresh.
name: John Singer Sargent

quote: Clay can be dirt in the wrong hands, but clay can be art in the right hands.
name: Lupita Nyong'o

quote: Architecture is basically the design of interiors, the art of organizing interior space.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: Advertising is fundamentally persuasion and persuasion happens to be not a science, but an art.
name: William Bernbach

quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Rhetoric is the art of ruling the minds of men.
name: Plato

quote: Tact is the art of making a point without making an enemy.
name: Isaac Newton

quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
name: Don Marquis

quote: Be slow to fall into friendship; but when thou art in, continue firm and constant.
name: Socrates

quote: Good art is art that allows you to enter it from a variety of angles and to emerge with a variety of views.
name: Mary Schmich

quote: Inspiration comes from everywhere: books, art, people on the street. It is an interior process for me.
name: Colleen Atwood

quote: The human foot is a masterpiece of engineering and a work of art.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: We at BMW do not build cars as consumer objects, just to drive from A to B. We build mobile works of art.
name: Chris Bangle

quote: A lot of cinematography is intuition. It's an art, not a formula.
name: Reed Morano

quote: I always like to see if the art across the street is better than mine.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: In mathematics the art of proposing a question must be held of higher value than solving it.
name: Georg Cantor

quote: If you're not trying to be real, you don't have to get it right. That's art.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: A good painting to me has always been like a friend. It keeps me company, comforts and inspires.
name: Hedy Lamarr

quote: A beautiful lady is an accident of nature. A beautiful old lady is a work of art.
name: Louis Nizer

quote: There is nothing in the world of art like the songs mother used to sing.
name: Billy Sunday

quote: The sole art that suits me is that which, rising from unrest, tends toward serenity.
name: Andre Gide

quote: The temple of art is built in words.
name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: All nature is but art unknown to thee.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: A museum is a spiritual place. People lower their voices when they get close to art.
name: Mario Botta

quote: Art washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: The marble not yet carved can hold the form of every thought the greatest artist has.
name: Michelangelo

quote: The walls between art and engineering exist only in our minds.
name: Theo Jansen

quote: Impressionism is the newspaper of the soul.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.
name: Hippocrates

quote: Art is not what you see, but what you make others see.
name: Edgar Degas

quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook.
name: William James

quote: Theatre is the art form of the present: it exists only in the present, and then it's gone.
name: Simon McBurney

quote: Errors are not in the art but in the artificers.
name: Isaac Newton

quote: Art is about building a new foundation, not just laying something on top of what's already there.
name: Prince

quote: I believe art is a connection, like passing on a flame.
name: Wangechi Mutu

quote: Art is always and everywhere the secret confession, and at the same time the immortal movement of its time.
name: Karl Marx

quote: An artist is somebody who produces things that people don't need to have.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: There is nothing worse than a sharp image of a fuzzy concept.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: Use the creative process - singing, writing, art, dance, whatever - to get to know yourself better.
name: Catie Curtis

quote: Art challenges technology, but technology inspires the art.
name: John Lasseter

quote: Art has the power to transform, to illuminate, to educate, inspire and motivate.
name: Harvey Fierstein

quote: You don't take a photograph, you make it.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: Blue thou art, intensely blue; Flower, whence came thy dazzling hue?
name: James Montgomery

quote: Through a painting we can see the whole world.
name: Hans Hofmann

quote: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.
name: Lord Byron

quote: The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.
name: Mark Van Doren

quote: Even a true artist does not always produce art.
name: Carroll O'Connor

quote: Art in Nature is rhythmic and has a horror of constraint.
name: Robert Delaunay

quote: Art! Who comprehends her? With whom can one consult concerning this great goddess?
name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Art in the classroom not only spurs creativity, it also inspires learning.
name: Mickey Hart

quote: I like to change. A new lamp, a piece of art, can transform a room.
name: Madonna Ciccone

quote: Making sushi is an art, and experience is everything.
name: Nobu Matsuhisa

quote: Sleeping is no mean art: for its sake one must stay awake all day.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Envy is the art of counting the other fellow's blessings instead of your own.
name: Harold Coffin

quote: Art is what you can get away with.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: Nothing is art if it does not come from nature.
name: Antoni Gaudi

quote: Art is either plagiarism or revolution.
name: Paul Gauguin

quote: I don't listen to what art critics say. I don't know anybody who needs a critic to find out what art is.
name: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quote: Music is art, and making watches is art, too.
name: J Balvin

quote: Baking is both an art and a science.
name: Sherry Yard

quote: Just as pure abstract art is not dogmatic, neither is it decorative.
name: Piet Mondrian

quote: Art evokes the mystery without which the world would not exist.
name: Rene Magritte

quote: Violin playing is a physical art with great traditions behind it.
name: Vanessa Mae

quote: I don't like to say I have given my life to art. I prefer to say art has given me my life.
name: Frank Stella

quote: Art consists of reshaping life, but it does not create life nor cause life.
name: Stanley Kubrick

quote: I feel like science and art are cousins.
name: Kate McKinnon

quote: Recycling old buildings to show art is very important.
name: Agnes Gund

quote: Sculpture is the art of the hole and the lump.
name: Auguste Rodin

quote: Simplicity is natures first step, and the last of art.
name: Philip James Bailey

quote: I prefer drawing to talking. Drawing is faster, and leaves less room for lies.
name: Le Corbusier

quote: What art offers is space - a certain breathing room for the spirit.
name: John Updike

quote: Sculpture is the art of the intelligence.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: Every artist was first an amateur.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: An artist is a dreamer consenting to dream of the actual world.
name: George Santayana

quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Art requires philosophy, just as philosophy requires art. Otherwise, what would become of beauty?
name: Paul Gauguin

quote: Art is to be free. Design is to fix.
name: Kanye West

quote: It is through art, and through art only, that we can realise our perfection.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Society is like a large piece of frozen water; and skating well is the great art of social life.
name: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quote: Women are our most miraculous muse, an enchanted intangibility that encourages all art.
name: CeeLo Green

quote: Advertising is the greatest art form of the 20th century.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: So vast is art, so narrow human wit.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Fine art is knowledge made visible.
name: Gustave Courbet

quote: For his heart was in his work, and the heart giveth grace unto every art.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: To create a work of art is to create the world.
name: Wassily Kandinsky

quote: Cunning is the art of concealing our own defects, and discovering other people's weaknesses.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Pitching is the art of instilling fear.
name: Sandy Koufax

quote: Art, in itself, is an attempt to bring order out of chaos.
name: Stephen Sondheim

quote: Impressionism; it is the birth of Light in painting.
name: Robert Delaunay

quote: In art, the hand can never execute anything higher than the heart can imagine.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Nature is the art of God.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: The greatness of art is not to find what is common but what is unique.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: Every production of an artist should be the expression of an adventure of his soul.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
name: Scott Adams

quote: Diplomacy is the art of saying 'Nice doggie' until you can find a rock.
name: Will Rogers

quote: It is the spectator, and not life, that art really mirrors.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Art is a step from what is obvious and well-known toward what is arcane and concealed.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Nature scarcely ever gives us the very best; for that we must have recourse to art.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: An art book is a museum without walls.
name: Andre Malraux

quote: A guilty conscience needs to confess. A work of art is a confession.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Art depends on luck and talent.
name: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: Only in art will the lion lie down with the lamb, and the rose grow without thorn.
name: Martin Amis

quote: Art consists of limitation. The most beautiful part of every picture is the frame.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Art is the imposing of a pattern on experience, and our aesthetic enjoyment is recognition of the pattern.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Art raises its head where creeds relax.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I'm afraid that if you look at a thing long enough, it loses all of its meaning.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: Cooking is an art form, a creative thing.
name: Clarence Clemons

quote: Fine art is that in which the hand, the head, and the heart of man go together.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Drawing is like making an expressive gesture with the advantage of permanence.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: Programming is the art of algorithm design and the craft of debugging errant code.
name: Ellen Ullman

quote: Black literature is taught as sociology, as tolerance, not as a serious, rigorous art form.
name: Toni Morrison

quote: My goal is to be one with the music. I just dedicate my whole life to this art.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: A line is a dot that went for a walk.
name: Paul Klee

quote: The new job of art is to sit on the wall and get more expensive.
name: Robert Hughes

quote: Ads are the cave art of the twentieth century.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: They teach you there's a boundary line to music. But, man, there's no boundary line to art.
name: Charlie Parker

quote: The strangeness will wear off and I think we will discover the deeper meanings in modern art.
name: Jackson Pollock

quote: Education is the art of making man ethical.
name: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: Should graffiti be judged on the same level as modern art? Of course not: It's way more important than that.
name: Banksy

quote: The whole art of war consists of guessing at what is on the other side of the hill.
name: Duke of Wellington

quote: Diplomacy: the art of restraining power.
name: Henry Kissinger

quote: Art is the stored honey of the human soul, gathered on wings of misery and travail.
name: Theodore Dreiser

quote: To catch a husband is an art; to hold him is a job.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: Fast bowling is an art, like spin bowling.
name: Kapil Dev

quote: I don't believe in art. I believe in artists.
name: Marcel Duchamp

quote: A man paints with his brains and not with his hands.
name: Michelangelo

quote: I don't really believe in 'directions' in art; the rope twists as you follow it, that's all.
name: Graham Nelson

quote: Lesser artists borrow, great artists steal.
name: Igor Stravinsky

quote: The works must be conceived with fire in the soul but executed with clinical coolness.
name: Joan Miro

quote: Painting is an infinitely minute part of my personality.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: There is no must in art because art is free.
name: Wassily Kandinsky

quote: Graffiti's always been a temporary art form. You make your mark and then they scrub it off.
name: Banksy

quote: Of all lies, art is the least untrue.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: The value of art is in the observer.
name: Agnes Martin

quote: Colloquial poetry is to the real art as the barber's wax dummy is to sculpture.
name: Ezra Pound

quote: Painting is by nature a luminous language.
name: Robert Delaunay

quote: Food can be expressive and therefore food can be art.
name: Grant Achatz

quote: Art hurts. Art urges voyages - and it is easier to stay at home.
name: Gwendolyn Brooks

quote: Painting is a nail to which I fasten my ideas.
name: Georges Braque

quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: When I have a camera in my hand, I know no fear.
name: Alfred Eisenstaedt

quote: My eyes were made to erase all that is ugly.
name: Raoul Dufy

quote: Art is the daughter of freedom.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: The enemy of art is the absence of limitations.
name: Orson Welles

quote: Art is not a thing; it is a way.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Beauty in art is often nothing but ugliness subdued.
name: Jean Rostand

quote: Insight is the first condition of Art.
name: George Henry Lewes

quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Life doesn't imitate art, it imitates bad television.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Art is dangerous. It is one of the attractions: when it ceases to be dangerous you don't want it.
name: Duke Ellington

quote: Great artists suffer for the people.
name: Marvin Gaye

quote: A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: What is Art? It is the response of man's creative soul to the call of the Real.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The art of photography is all about directing the attention of the viewer.
name: Steven Pinker

quote: Cleanliness is the scourge of art.
name: Craig Brown

quote: Ethics is in origin the art of recommending to others the sacrifices required for cooperation with oneself.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: My love of fine art increased - the more of it I saw, the more of it I wanted to see.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: To an engineer, good enough means perfect. With an artist, there's no such thing as perfect.
name: Alexander Calder

quote: Trifles make perfection, and perfection is no trifle.
name: Michelangelo

quote: Pictures deface walls more often than they decorate them.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: A sculptor is a person who is interested in the shape of things, a poet in words, a musician by sounds.
name: Henry Moore

quote: I think having land and not ruining it is the most beautiful art that anybody could ever want to own.
name: Andy Warhol

quote: An intellectual says a simple thing in a hard way. An artist says a hard thing in a simple way.
name: Charles Bukowski

quote: The art of life is to know how to enjoy a little and to endure very much.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Art is the path to being spiritual.
name: Piet Mondrian

quote: The principles of true art is not to portray, but to evoke.
name: Jerzy Kosinski

quote: My imagination can picture no fairer happiness than to continue living for art.
name: Clara Schumann

quote: Where thou art, that is home.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: I think in art, but especially in films, people are trying to confirm their own existences.
name: Jim Morrison

quote: Stand-up comedy is an art form and it dies unless you expand it.
name: Sam Kinison

quote: Art is making something out of nothing and selling it.
name: Frank Zappa

quote: Art, like morality, consists in drawing the line somewhere.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Dancers are a work of art - they are the canvas on which their work is painted.
name: Patrick Duffy

quote: An empty canvas is a living wonder... far lovelier than certain pictures.
name: Wassily Kandinsky

quote: Photographing a cake can be art.
name: Irving Penn

quote: A writer should write with his eyes and a painter paint with his ears.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: The business of art is to reveal the relation between man and his environment.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Art is a harmony parallel with nature.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: To send light into the darkness of men's hearts - such is the duty of the artist.
name: Robert Schumann

quote: The modern artist is working with space and time, and expressing his feelings rather than illustrating.
name: Jackson Pollock

quote: Art resides in the quality of doing, process is not magic.
name: Charles Eames

quote: The art of being a slave is to rule one's master.
name: Diogenes

quote: One's art goes as far and as deep as one's love goes.
name: Andrew Wyeth

quote: With an apple I will astonish Paris.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: Art is the concrete representation of our most subtle feelings.
name: Agnes Martin

quote: Every good painter paints what he is.
name: Jackson Pollock

quote: For me, art is supposed to be a question mark.
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: The mediator of the inexpressible is the work of art.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Photography is more than a medium for factual communication of ideas. It is a creative art.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: Works of art make rules; rules do not make works of art.
name: Claude Debussy

quote: Art should be an oasis: a place or refuge from the hardness of life.
name: Fernando Botero

quote: Art is nothing if you don't reach every segment of the people.
name: Keith Haring

quote: A blind man can make art if what is in his mind can be passed to another mind in some tangible form.
name: Sol LeWitt

quote: Art school can be a wonderful place if you're trying to find your voice and your style and your taste.
name: Abbi Jacobson

quote: What makes photography a strange invention is that its primary raw materials are light and time.
name: John Berger

quote: My lens and my personality, it's just fluid. The art isn't just in one place.
name: Petra Collins

quote: I think good art does come from a dark place.
name: Rick Springfield

quote: It is more important to click with people than to click the shutter.
name: Alfred Eisenstaedt

quote: 'Healing,' Papa would tell me, 'is not a science, but the intuitive art of wooing nature.'
name: W. H. Auden

quote: Gossip is the art of saying nothing in a way that leaves practically nothing unsaid.
name: Walter Winchell

quote: Art attracts us only by what it reveals of our most secret self.
name: Jean-Luc Godard

quote: I do not want art for a few any more than education for a few, or freedom for a few.
name: William Morris

quote: An artist cannot fail; it is a success to be one.
name: Charles Horton Cooley

quote: A work of art is above all an adventure of the mind.
name: Eugene Ionesco

quote: There is only one valuable thing in art: the thing you cannot explain.
name: Georges Braque

quote: An empty canvas is full.
name: Robert Rauschenberg

quote: An artist is forced by others to paint out of his own free will.
name: Willem de Kooning

quote: An artist's only concern is to shoot for some kind of perfection, and on his own terms, not anyone else's.
name: J. D. Salinger

quote: What I wanted to do was to paint sunlight on the side of a house.
name: Edward Hopper

quote: Art is anything you can get away with.
name: Marshall McLuhan

quote: Science is what we understand well enough to explain to a computer. Art is everything else we do.
name: Donald Knuth

quote: For me, art doesn't stop at the gallery space.
name: Petra Collins

quote: I am interested in mathematics only as a creative art.
name: G. H. Hardy

quote: In art, the obvious is a sin.
name: Edward Dmytryk

quote: Painting, n.: The art of protecting flat surfaces from the weather, and exposing them to the critic.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: An artist never really finishes his work, he merely abandons it.
name: Paul Valery

quote: All art is autobiographical. The pearl is the oyster's autobiography.
name: Federico Fellini

quote: If we could but paint with the hand what we see with the eye.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: The writer, when he is also an artist, is someone who admits what others don't dare reveal.
name: Elia Kazan

quote: The vitality of a new movement in Art must be gauged by the fury it arouses.
name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: Art cannot be modern. Art is primordially eternal.
name: Egon Schiele

quote: All great art is born of the metropolis.
name: Ezra Pound

quote: I collect human relationships very much the way others collect fine art.
name: Jerzy Kosinski

quote: What I wish to show when I paint is the way I see things with my eyes and in my heart.
name: Raoul Dufy

quote: I don't want to be interesting. I want to be good.
name: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

quote: Love the art in yourself and not yourself in the art.
name: Constantin Stanislavski

quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: The artist who aims at perfection in everything achieves it in nothing.
name: Eugene Delacroix

quote: I don't want life to imitate art. I want life to be art.
name: Ernst Fischer

quote: It is not in life, but in art that self-fulfillment is to be found.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: Art is the most beautiful of all lies.
name: Claude Debussy

quote: Art attracts us only by what it reveals of our most secret self.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work.
name: Emile Zola

quote: The highest art is always the most religious, and the greatest artist is always a devout person.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The mission of art is to represent nature not to imitate her.
name: William Morris Hunt

quote: I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: I think you can leave the arts, superior or inferior, to the conscience of mankind.
name: William Butler Yeats

quote: There's an art to being a good actor, there's an art to being a celebrity, and there's an art to longevity.
name: Rocky Carroll

quote: Mournful and yet grand is the destiny of the artist.
name: Franz Liszt

quote: Any authentic work of art must start an argument between the artist and his audience.
name: Rebecca West

quote: Art doesn't transform. It just plain forms.
name: Roy Lichtenstein

quote: My painting does not come from the easel.
name: Jackson Pollock

quote: True art is characterized by an irresistible urge in the creative artist.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Art is born of humiliation.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: Pictures must not be too picturesque.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I never called my work an 'art'. It's part of show business, the business of building entertainment.
name: Walt Disney

quote: We have art in order not to die of the truth.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The bad gains respect through imitation, the good loses it especially in art.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Homer has taught all other poets the art of telling lies skillfully.
name: Aristotle

quote: I don't think about art when I'm working. I try to think about life.
name: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quote: Animation is not the art of drawings that move but the art of movements that are drawn.
name: Norman McLaren

quote: When art dresses in worn-out material it is most easily recognized as art.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: To say nothing, especially when speaking, is half the art of diplomacy.
name: Will Durant

quote: Every human is an artist. And this is the main art that we have: the creation of our story.
name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Art is the most intense mode of individualism that the world has known.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: A work of art is the unique result of a unique temperament.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: To array a man's will against his sickness is the supreme art of medicine.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: In Art, man reveals himself and not his objects.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The Iranians and Persians are excellent at the art of negotiation.
name: Donald Trump

quote: Art is individualism, and individualism is a disturbing and disintegrating force.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: The fine art of preparing sushi is something that you watch and learn.
name: Nobu Matsuhisa

quote: Treat a work of art like a prince. Let it speak to you first.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: The most seductive thing about art is the personality of the artist himself.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: No great artist ever sees things as they really are. If he did, he would cease to be an artist.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Art is the right hand of Nature. The latter has only given us being, the former has made us men.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: I have no fear of making changes, destroying the image, etc., because the painting has a life of its own.
name: Jackson Pollock

quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
name: Albert Ellis

quote: All art is but imitation of nature.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I wanted to start a revolution, using art to build the sort of society I myself envisioned.
name: Yayoi Kusama

quote: It's an art to live with pain... mix the light into gray.
name: Eddie Vedder

quote: Without freedom, no art; art lives only on the restraints it imposes on itself, and dies of all others.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Religion and art spring from the same root and are close kin. Economics and art are strangers.
name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: The art of leadership is saying no, not saying yes. It is very easy to say yes.
name: Tony Blair

quote: Without art, the crudeness of reality would make the world unbearable.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: A work of art is a world in itself reflecting senses and emotions of the artist's world.
name: Hans Hofmann

quote: Like music and art, love of nature is a common language that can transcend political or social boundaries.
name: Jimmy Carter

quote: Are you really sure that a floor can't also be a ceiling?
name: M. C. Escher

quote: Only through art can we emerge from ourselves and know what another person sees.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: The artist's job is to be a witness to his time in history.
name: Robert Rauschenberg

quote: When thou art above measure angry, bethink thee how momentary is man's life.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Life is short, the art long.
name: Hippocrates

quote: Art is parasitic on life, just as criticism is parasitic on art.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: Art is the only way to run away without leaving home.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: Life is an illusion. I am held together in the nothingness by art.
name: Anselm Kiefer

quote: Art does not reproduce what we see; rather, it makes us see.
name: Paul Klee

quote: You should never feel afraid to become a piece of art. It's exhilarating.
name: Nicki Minaj

quote: The art of delegation is one of the key skills any entrepreneur must master.
name: Richard Branson

quote: Any great art is meant to illuminate the human condition.
name: Sterling K. Brown

quote: I collect art like other people eat pizza. I can't get enough of it. I need a constant source of inspiration.
name: Peter Marino

quote: Art is not a study of positive reality, it is the seeking for ideal truth.
name: John Ruskin

quote: The essence of all art is to have pleasure in giving pleasure.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Controversy is part of the nature of art and creativity.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: A Bachelor of Arts is one who makes love to a lot of women, and yet has the art to remain a bachelor.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: The principle of art is to pause, not bypass.
name: Jerzy Kosinski

quote: Draw your pleasure, paint your pleasure, and express your pleasure strongly.
name: Pierre Bonnard

quote: The body is your instrument in dance, but your art is outside that creature, the body.
name: Martha Graham

quote: Not everybody trusts paintings but people believe photographs.
name: Ansel Adams

quote: Art is man's expression of his joy in labor.
name: Henry Kissinger

quote: The moment you cheat for the sake of beauty, you know you're an artist.
name: David Hockney

quote: Art is like a border of flowers along the course of civilization.
name: Lincoln Steffens

quote: To help, to continually help and share, that is the sum of all knowledge; that is the meaning of art.
name: Eleonora Duse

quote: Every science begins as philosophy and ends as art.
name: Will Durant

quote: My hand is the extension of the thinking process - the creative process.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: I really believe there are things nobody would see if I didn't photograph them.
name: Diane Arbus

quote: The people who make art their business are mostly imposters.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: I love music videos, I really do. I think it's kind of sad that it's a dying art form.
name: Adam Levine

quote: Any fool can have bad luck; the art consists in knowing how to exploit it.
name: Frank Wedekind

quote: The challenge is to practice politics as the art of making what appears to be impossible, possible.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Every art expression is rooted fundamentally in the personality and temperament of the artist.
name: Hans Hofmann

quote: Art for art's sake is a philosophy of the well-fed.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: In art the best is good enough.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: It is after all the greatest art to limit and isolate oneself.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: He who possesses art and science has religion; he who does not possess them, needs religion.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Whether it be personal or musical, I just think I'm a walking art piece, just a ball of creativity.
name: Chris Brown

quote: Art used to be made in the name of faith. We made cathedrals, we made stained-glass windows, we made murals.
name: Julia Cameron

quote: If my art has nothing to do with people's pain and sorrow, what is 'art' for?
name: Ai Weiwei

quote: Visual storytelling utilizes both language and art to pass on the essence of who we are.
name: Debbie Millman

quote: There is nothing new in art except talent.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: Art is going to make a bigger comeback than ever. That's the upside to things getting challenging.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: All art is contemporary art because it had to be made when it was now.
name: James Turrell

quote: There's not a lot of art forms where you can control your presentation and your ideas.
name: Gerard Way

quote: I choose a block of marble and chop off whatever I don't need.
name: Auguste Rodin

quote: An original artist is unable to copy. So he has only to copy in order to be original.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: With color one obtains an energy that seems to stem from witchcraft.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: Figure skating is a mixture of art and sport.
name: Katarina Witt

quote: A painting that is well composed is half finished.
name: Pierre Bonnard

quote: The wealthy are always surrounded by hangers-on; science and art are as well.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: Good art provides people with a vocabulary about things they can't articulate.
name: Mos Def

quote: Fashion is only the attempt to realize art in living forms and social intercourse.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: I paint with shapes.
name: Alexander Calder

quote: Opera is one of the most important art forms. It should be listened to and appreciated by everyone.
name: Luciano Pavarotti

quote: Once an object has been incorporated in a picture it accepts a new destiny.
name: Georges Braque

quote: A work of art that contains theories is like an object on which the price tag has been left.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: Most good art is left wing. It's a moot point whether there is any good right-wing art.
name: Samuel West

quote: It's clever, but is it Art?
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Photograph: a picture painted by the sun without instruction in art.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I like to pretend that my art has nothing to do with me.
name: Roy Lichtenstein

quote: In art as in love, instinct is enough.
name: Anatole France

quote: I love the art world, I love art galleries, I love what it means - I love art.
name: Nas

quote: I could say diamonds are a girl's best friend, and that never changes. But the taste for art did change.
name: Susan Vreeland

quote: Murals in restaurants are on a par with the food in museums.
name: Peter De Vries

quote: Evil is committed without effort, naturally, fatally; goodness is always the product of some art.
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: You have to write and develop and wait for the world to catch up to your art.
name: Lena Waithe

quote: Minimal art went nowhere.
name: Sol LeWitt

quote: Life beats down and crushes the soul and art reminds you that you have one.
name: Stella Adler

quote: I don't paint things. I only paint the difference between things.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: Politics is the art of the next best.
name: Otto von Bismarck

quote: The art of using deceit and cunning grow continually weaker and less effective to the user.
name: John Tillotson

quote: Art should be created for life, not for the museum.
name: Jean Nouvel

quote: Art is really about perception, and mine have been changed through visiting other realities.
name: Fred Tomaselli

quote: A great artist is always before his time or behind it.
name: George Edward Moore

quote: I came to the conviction that film criticism, in and of itself, was an art.
name: Rod Lurie

quote: A lot of art and visual crafts are based on appropriating things.
name: Lazaro Hernandez

quote: The waking mind is the least serviceable in the arts.
name: Henry Miller

quote: Art is a collaboration between God and the artist, and the less the artist does the better.
name: Andre Gide

quote: Art is the collaboration between God and the artist, and the less the artist does the better.
name: Andre Gide

quote: Art can only be truly art by presenting an adequate outward symbol of some fact in the interior life.
name: Margaret Fuller

quote: If you cannot learn to love real art, at least learn to hate sham art and reject it.
name: William Morris

quote: If only life could be a little more tender and art a little more robust.
name: Alan Rickman

quote: That's the motivation of an artist - to seek attention of some kind.
name: James Taylor

quote: I don't need the money, dear. I work for art.
name: Maria Callas

quote: Literature flourishes best when it is half a trade and half an art.
name: William Inge

quote: Great art picks up where nature ends.
name: Marc Chagall

quote: I feel like life imitates art, or art imitates life. I always take on roles that I'm passionate about.
name: Tia Mowry

quote: Our individual lives cannot, generally, be works of art unless the social order is also.
name: Charles Horton Cooley

quote: Artists don't make objects. Artists make mythologies.
name: Anish Kapoor

quote: To curb the machine and limit art to handicraft is a denial of opportunity.
name: Lewis Mumford

quote: People who think about art as an investment are pathetic.
name: Walter Annenberg

quote: One eye sees, the other feels.
name: Paul Klee

quote: I'm not a craftsman of graphics or art or film. I'm more of an idea generator and manufacturer.
name: Mike Mills

quote: When hospitality becomes an art it loses its very soul.
name: Max Beerbohm

quote: When that shutter clicks, anything else that can be done afterward is not worth consideration.
name: Edward Steichen

quote: There is an art of reading, as well as an art of thinking, and an art of writing.
name: Clarence Day

quote: They're not poodles, they're art.
name: Rachael Leigh Cook

quote: Art isn't complete until it's shared.
name: Seph Lawless

quote: I'm inspired by throwing out any darkness that is inside of me. For me, art cures.
name: Jordi Molla

quote: Painting is the passage from the chaos of the emotions to the order of the possible.
name: Balthus

quote: My first job in construction paid my way through art school. I was building to pay my bills.
name: Ty Pennington

quote: More than art, more than literature, music is universally accessible.
name: Billy Joel

quote: Suddenly I've got an overwhelming desire to surround myself with the aura of classical and Romantic art.
name: Sylvester Stallone

quote: All good art is an indiscretion.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: Wushu is a move in Chinese, a physical move. An attack. Wushu is like an art.
name: Jet Li

quote: It is a symbol of Irish art. The cracked looking-glass of a servant.
name: James Joyce

quote: Art has to move you and design does not, unless it's a good design for a bus.
name: David Hockney

quote: What I didn't know was I was deeply attracted to the big space.
name: David Hockney

quote: My hobbies away from horse racing would be reading and painting; I love art.
name: Chantal Sutherland

quote: The basis of art is truth, both in matter and in mode.
name: Flannery O'Connor

quote: I try to keep a low profile in general. Not with my art, but just as a person.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: What is art but a way of seeing?
name: Saul Bellow

quote: My kids are my greatest piece of art.
name: Jason Momoa

quote: Emotion resulting from a work of art is only of value when it is not obtained by sentimental blackmail.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: The best artists know what to leave out.
name: Charles de Lint

quote: Artists who seek perfection in everything are those who cannot attain it in anything.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Who would dare assign to art the sterile function of imitating nature?
name: Charles Baudelaire

quote: Art is everywhere, and everywhere is art.
name: Brandon Boyd

quote: When artists make art, they shouldn't question whether it is permissible to do one thing or another.
name: Sol LeWitt

quote: The artist belongs to his work, not the work to the artist.
name: Novalis

quote: A great artist can paint a great picture on a small canvas.
name: Charles Dudley Warner

quote: That's why people listen to music or look at paintings. To get in touch with that wholeness.
name: Corita Kent

quote: What the future of the planet and music and art and all of it is sharing; it's diversity.
name: Taj Mahal

quote: Teaching is not a lost art, but the regard for it is a lost tradition.
name: Jacques Barzun

quote: Art is the triumph over chaos.
name: John Cheever

quote: Rules and models destroy genius and art.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Oh, if it be to choose and call thee mine, love, thou art every day my Valentine!
name: Thomas Hood

quote: When one paints an ideal, one does not need to limit one's imagination.
name: Ellen Key

quote: Children's literature is as valid an art form as any other.
name: Lloyd Alexander

quote: I think of my peace paintings as one long poem, with each painting being a single stanza.
name: Robert Indiana

quote: It may be that the deep necessity of art is the examination of self-deception.
name: Robert Motherwell

quote: Wherever art appears, life disappears.
name: Robert Motherwell

quote: I hope to live all my life for my art, without abandoning my principles one iota.
name: Gustave Courbet

quote: Art is the unceasing effort to compete with the beauty of flowers - and never succeeding.
name: Gian Carlo Menotti

quote: To make pictures big is to make them more powerful.
name: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: I will preach with my brush.
name: Henry Ossawa Tanner

quote: Science is spectral analysis. Art is light synthesis.
name: Karl Kraus

quote: Art is nature speeded up and God slowed down.
name: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: Playing a Fender is an art itself. They're always going out of tune.
name: Ritchie Blackmore

quote: Artists live in unknown spaces and give themselves over to following something unknown.
name: Kiki Smith

quote: Contrary to general belief, an artist is never ahead of his time but most people are far behind theirs.
name: Edgard Varese

quote: One must always draw, draw with the eyes, when one cannot draw with a pencil.
name: Balthus

quote: Art never seems to make me peaceful or pure.
name: Willem de Kooning

quote: I rarely draw what I see. I draw what I feel in my body.
name: Barbara Hepworth

quote: The history of art is the history of revivals.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: The beauty one can find in art is one of the pitifully few real and lasting products of human endeavor.
name: J. Paul Getty

quote: Art is magic delivered from the lie of being truth.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: The task of art today is to bring chaos into order.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: I think an artist's responsibility is more complex than people realize.
name: Jodie Foster

quote: The very essence of the creative is its novelty, and hence we have no standard by which to judge it.
name: Carl Rogers

quote: A work of art has no importance whatever to society. It is only important to the individual.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Art is science made clear.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: Art is the final cunning of the human soul which would rather do anything than face the gods.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: All art is a struggle to be, in a particular sort of way, virtuous.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: Painting and writing are solitary arts.
name: Conrad Hall

quote: Trying to force creativity is never good.
name: Sarah McLachlan

quote: Art distills sensations and embodies it with enhanced meaning.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: The worse my drawings were, the more beautiful did the originals appear.
name: John James Audubon

quote: Great art is never produced for its own sake. It is too difficult to be worth the effort.
name: Robert Quillen

quote: Paint the essential character of things.
name: Camille Pissarro

quote: I cry out for order and find it only in art.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: Art is a marriage of the conscious and the unconscious.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: An artist cannot speak about his art any more than a plant can discuss horticulture.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: I don't think there's any artist of any value who doesn't doubt what they're doing.
name: Francis Ford Coppola

quote: Every artist writes his own autobiography.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: Art is one thing that can go on mattering once it has stopped hurting.
name: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: The perfection of art is to conceal art.
name: Quintilian

quote: Every creator painfully experiences the chasm between his inner vision and its ultimate expression.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: There hasn't been any art yet. Art is just beginning.
name: Constantin Brancusi

quote: The more horrifying this world becomes, the more art becomes abstract.
name: Ellen Key

quote: Art must take reality by surprise.
name: Francoise Sagan

quote: My paintings are not about what is seen. They are about what is known forever in the mind.
name: Agnes Martin

quote: I realize that protest paintings are not exactly in vogue, but I've done many.
name: Robert Indiana

quote: I was the least Pop of all the Pop artists.
name: Robert Indiana

quote: Artists themselves are not confined, but their output is.
name: Robert Smithson

quote: Art is Art. Everything else is everything else.
name: Ad Reinhardt

quote: Art is too serious to be taken seriously.
name: Ad Reinhardt

quote: The worst state of affairs is when science begins to concern itself with art.
name: Paul Klee

quote: Most art is fragile and some should be placed and never moved away.
name: Donald Judd

quote: When I work, and in my art, I hold hands with God.
name: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: You begin with the possibilities of the material.
name: Robert Rauschenberg

quote: Immature artists imitate. Mature artists steal.
name: Lionel Trilling

quote: What marks the artist is his power to shape the material of pain we all have.
name: Lionel Trilling

quote: Art ought never to be considered except in its relations with its ideal beauty.
name: Alfred de Vigny

quote: Of what use were the arts if they were only the reproduction and the imitation of life?
name: Alfred de Vigny

quote: Art is pattern informed by sensibility.
name: Herbert Read

quote: The philistine provides the best definition of art. Anything that makes him rage is first class.
name: Louis Dudek

quote: Art is anything people do with distinction.
name: Louis Dudek

quote: An artist carries on throughout his life a mysterious, uninterrupted conversation with his public.
name: Maurice Chevalier

quote: Rationalism is the enemy of art, though necessary as a basis for architecture.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: Vitality is radiated from exceptional art and architecture.
name: Arthur Erickson

quote: If you know somethin' well, you can always paint it but people would be better off buyin' chickens.
name: Grandma Moses

quote: I am not strong on perfection.
name: Jasper Johns

quote: Photography is a major force in explaining man to man.
name: Edward Steichen

quote: Abstract art: a product of the untalented sold by the unprincipled to the utterly bewildered.
name: Al Capp

quote: To paint is a possessing rather than a picturing.
name: Philip Guston

quote: Painting seems like some kind of peculiar miracle that I need to have again and again.
name: Philip Guston

quote: Great art is an instant arrested in eternity.
name: James Huneker

quote: Art is a revolt against fate. All art is a revolt against man's fate.
name: Andre Malraux

quote: No heirloom of humankind captures the past as do art and language.
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: Art is subject to arbitrary fashion.
name: Kary Mullis

quote: A room hung with pictures is a room hung with thoughts.
name: Joshua Reynolds

quote: If a building becomes architecture, then it is art.
name: Arne Jacobsen

quote: The goal of art was the vital expression of self.
name: Alfred Stieglitz

quote: I see myself and many artists like me as the torchbearers through these dark ages.
name: John Zorn

quote: When I make art, I think about its ability to connect with others, to bring them into the process.
name: Jim Hodges

quote: Layer by layer art strips life bare.
name: Robert Musil

quote: Every picture shows a spot with which the artist has fallen in love.
name: Alfred Sisley
